rules_text:
Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains menace until end of turn.
When this creature dies, sacrifice a permanent.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a nonland permanent.
flavor_text:
[i]“We will fill their veins with ichor. They will succumb to our power or suffer under their worthless forms.”
—Sheoldred, Blighted Thane[/i]
